ai-patthana15.62:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, and constantly preciously,
ai-patthana15.62:0.3_0: Talking on equanimity and looking forward.
ai-patthana15.62:1.1_0: Equanimity of equanimity doesn’t give rise to the thought. You don’t give rise to the cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.62:1.1_1: equanimity does not come to the wrong way for the sake of equanimity, or for the skillful,
ai-patthana15.62:1.1_2: Equanimity of equanimity, and skillful qualities arise. You should not give a teaching because of this.
ai-patthana15.62:1.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.62:2.1_0: Equanimity of equanimity doesn’t give rise to the unprofitable teaching. Equanimous bliss arises in him.
ai-patthana15.62:2.1_1: equanimity doesn’t give rise to the unprofitable teaching. It doesn’t give rise to unskillful qualities.
ai-patthana15.62:2.1_2: Equanimity of equanimity, and unskillful qualities arise in someone who isn’t skilled in equanimity, or cause or reasoned by cause or reason.
ai-patthana15.62:2.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana15.62:2.1_5: What is an unshakable, in the three ways?
